title: Comparisons to Monet Bothered This Artist. Now They’re Side by Side.
description: Joan Mitchell, an Abstract Expressionist, hated being compared to Monet. Now he’s right next to her in one of two Paris shows that celebrate her work.
dc:creator: Farah Nayeri
media:description: Last minute preparations for the “Monet-Mitchell” exhibition at the Fondation Vuitton.
